title: Introduction to the performing arts: opera with Henry Butler
creator_credit: Robert Saudek Associates, Learning Corporation of America, Robert Saudek and Roger Englander
brief_description: Henry Butler, stage director for the New York Metropolitan Opera Company, comments on the emotional inspiration for opera, famous opera houses, and trends in opera today. Includes interviews with the performers, and long extracts from performances of La Traviata and I Pagliacci.
